Package org.cesecore.certificates.ca

Class CvcCA

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.internal.UpgradeableDataHashMap
      • org.cesecore.certificates.ca.CA
        • org.cesecore.certificates.ca.CvcCA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IUpgradeableData
    public abstract class CvcCA
extends CA
implements Serializable
    Base class for CVC CAs. Holds data specific for Certificate and CRL generation according to the CVC (Card Verifiable Certificate) standards, which are not real standards. There can be many different implementations of CVC CA which are quite different, for example EU EAC electronic passports, Tachographs and eIDs.
    Version:
    $Id: CvcCA.java 30618 2018-11-26 07:27:19Z samuellb $
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
